item.description: * this post is apart of a workshop i hosted for Starhacks ðŸ’« * Discord is a powerful messaging platform with great chat capabilities originally built to serve gaming communities. it has grown to a massive popularity and offers a lot of customization and autonomy via bots, custom moderation tools and more, which Iâ€™ll show you how to work with! in this tutorial Iâ€™ll show you how to set up a fully customizable Discord bot that can be running on your server in under 15 minutes.
